420.title: Cheating and Dishonestly Inducing Delivery of Property
420.summary: This section deals with cheating where a person deceives another to deliver property or valuable security.
420.punishment: Imprisonment up to 7 years and fine

302.title: Punishment for Murder
302.summary: This section applies when a person intentionally causes the death of another person.
302.punishment: Death or life imprisonment and fine
